message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value and would be a great investment for you.
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is way above my budget. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $13,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents the value I place on this product, I understand your budget constraints. Let's meet in the middle - how about $17,000?
Hi Alice, $17,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000. This is my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
